cards.title: Easy Event Management
cards.description: Quickly create, organize, and discover board game events.

cards.title: Game Voting & Suggestions
cards.description: Vote for your favorite games or suggest new ones for upcoming events.

cards.title: Simple Event Check-In
cards.description: Seamlessly confirm your participation and track attendance.

cards.title: Rewards & Achievements
cards.description: Earn badges and recognize top players at every event.

cards.title: Safe & Friendly Community
cards.description: Easily report inappropriate behavior and help keep the community welcoming.

cards.title: Player Preferences & Matchmaking
cards.description: Get matched with players who enjoy the same games as you. The app considers player preferences to suggest suitable event groups and optimize game selection for the best experience.

cards.title: Event Stats & History
cards.description: Track your games, wins, badges, and participation over time. View detailed stats for your gaming activity, including past events, favorite games, and earned achievements.

cards.title: Community Recognition & Social Features
cards.description: Vote for MVPs, comment on games, and build your gamer profile. Recognize top players at each event, leave feedback, and grow your presence within the community.

questions.title: Is the platform free to use?
questions.answer: Yes! Creating an account, joining events, and using core features are completely free. We may add premium features in the future, but the essentials will always remain free.

questions.title: Do I need to host an event to use the app?
questions.answer: Not at all. You can join public events created by others or just explore the platform and vote on game preferences.

questions.title: Can I use the app for private game nights with friends?
questions.answer: Absolutely. You can create private events and share the link only with people you invite.

questions.title: How are games chosen for an event?
questions.answer: Attendees can vote for their favorite games or suggest new ones. Once the required number of players is reached, the most-voted games are selected automatically.

questions.title: What kind of badges can I earn?
questions.answer: You can earn badges for things like attending multiple events, hosting games, being voted MVP, or introducing new players to the platform.

questions.title: Is there a mobile version or app?
questions.answer: A mobile app is currently in development! Until then, the platform works great on mobile browsers.
